alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 01 at 10:36AM EDT until November 02 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. * WHERE...Metro Palm Beach County, Metro Broward County, Metropolitan Miami Dade, Coastal Palm Beach County, Coastal Broward County and Coastal Miami Dade County. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 8 PM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
